net.realmproject.dcm.features.command

Interface CommandDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identity, Logging
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Camera, ICommandDevice, MjpegCamera, UrlCamera

    public interface CommandDevice
extends Identity, Logging
    Interface for a device accepting Command messages and automatically dispatching them to methods with CommandMethod and Arg annotations.
    Author:
    NAS

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void afterCommand(Command command)
      This function is called after a CommandMethod is invoked

      This function is called before a CommandMethod is invoked.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.realmproject.dcm.event.identity.Identity

      • Methods inherited from interface net.realmproject.dcm.event.Logging

        getLog

    • Method Detail

      • beforeCommand

        default boolean beforeCommand(Command command)
        This function is called before a CommandMethod is invoked. If this method returns false, the method invocation will not proceed.
        Parameters:
        command - The command which is about to be processed. This is before the command undergoes type conversion to match the argument type for the appropriate method.
        Returns:
        true of the command should be executed, false otherwise

      • afterCommand

        default void afterCommand(Command command)
        This function is called after a CommandMethod is invoked
        Parameters:
        command - The command which is about to be processed. This is before the command undergoes type conversion to match the argument type for the appropriate method.

      • runCommand

        default void runCommand(Command command)

      • getCommandDispatcher

        CommandDispatcher getCommandDispatcher()
        Get the command dispatcher for this Device
        Returns:
        the CommandDispatcher for this device
